time.Description: Time (s) relative to eye-tracking stream start; add StartTime to align with EEG.

timestamp.Description: Original LSL timestamp from the pupil stream.

x_coordinate.Description: Gaze x-position in normalized coordinates (0-1) derived from norm_pos_x (clipped to [0, 1]).

y_coordinate.Description: Gaze y-position in normalized coordinates (0-1) derived from norm_pos_y (clipped to [0, 1]).

pupil_size.Description: Mean pupil diameter from available diameter channels (negative values clipped to 0).
